comments.body: I'm trying to standardize this based on the SPDX strings to make it easier to read them in the future. This one would be GPL-2.0 according to https://spdx.org/licenses/GPL-2.0.html

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +30,34 @@about:
  home: https://s3tools.org/s3cmd
  license: GPL v2
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: LICENSE
